home.ongoingIncidents: No ongoing incident | Ongoing incident | Ongoing incidents
home.downMonitors: No monitor is down or suspicious | Monitor down or suspicious | Monitors down or suspicious

monitors.totalMonitorCount: No monitor | 1 total monitor | {count} total monitors
monitors.filteredMonitorCount: {count} monitor is hidden by the filters | {count} monitors are hidden by the filters
monitors.pausedMonitorNotice: This monitor is currently inactive. Click the Start button to resume monitoring this endpoint.

noIncident.title: No incident
noIncident.text: This monitor has never failed yet. If it fails, the incident history will appear here.

emptyPage.title: Nothing here yet
emptyPage.text: Create your first monitor to start monitoring your website.

form.urlDescription: Which URL would you like us to monitor?
form.refreshIntervalDescription: The refresh interval determines how often we will check your URL's health. A shorter interval enables issues to be detected more quickly, at the expense of greater load on your server.
form.tagsDescription: Tags are optional. We use this to group monitors, so you can manage them more easily.
form.downtimeConfirmationThresholdDescription: Determines how many consecutive failures can occur before this monitor becomes down. When a failure occurs, the monitor will become 'Suspicious' until this threshold is reached, then it will transition from 'Suspicious' to 'Down'.
form.recoveryConfirmationThresholdDescription: Determines how many consecutive successes need to occur before a 'Down' monitor becomes 'Up' again. Until this threshold is reached, the monitor will be marked as 'Recovering'
form.notificationSettingsDescription: Determines the notifications that will be sent in case of monitor failure

incidents.totalIncidentCount: No incident | 1 total incident | {count} total incidents
incidents.filteredIncidentCount: {count} incident hidden by filters | {count} incidents hidden by filters

emptyPage.title: Everything is OK right now
emptyPage.text: When we detect a failure, an incident will appear here.

httpMonitorIncidents.invalidHttpCode: The endpoint return the invalid HTTP Code {httpCode}
httpMonitorIncidents.timedOut: Request timed out, the server took too long to respond

pushNotifications.title: Push Notifications
pushNotifications.alreadyAccepted: You have already accepted Push notifications
pushNotifications.description: Push notifications allow you to be informed in real-time, on your device, about incidents.

invalidProfileToast.title: Invalid form
invalidProfileToast.body: Your account cannot be updated because some fields are missing or invalid.

sessionInvalidationToast.title: Prepare to be logged out
sessionInvalidationToast.body: Your info has been saved. For your own security, your session will expire in a few seconds. You will need to type your password again to continue using Duty Duck.

successToast.title: Info updated
successToast.body: Your info has been updated. You can continue using Duty Duck.

successToastNotification.title: User invited
successToastNotification.body: The user has been invited to the organization

errorToastNotification.title: Error inviting user
errorToastNotification.body: An error occurred while inviting the user

inviteUserModal.title: Invite user to organization
inviteUserModal.description: You can invite users to your organization, {organization}, by entering their email address below.
inviteUserModal.emailDescription: They will receive an email with a link to join the organization.

updateUserRolesModal.title: Update user roles
updateUserRolesModal.description: You are about to update the roles of {firstName} {lastName}.

revokeUserModal.title: Revoke user from organization
revokeUserModal.confirmationMessage: You are about to revoke {firstName} {lastName} from the organization. This action cannot be undone.
revokeUserModal.instructionMessage: To complete the action, please enter the user name below:

form.emailDescription: We won't share your e-mail with anyone
form.passwordDescription: We recommend using a strong, random password
form.organizationDescription: After you sign up, you will be able to invite other members of your organization to collaborate. The name of your organization will show on e-mails and invoices.
form.organizationRename: Don't worry, you will be able to rename your organization later

success.title: Thank you for registering!
success.message: You may now go to your personal dashboard to create your first monitors

conflict.title: A user already exists with this e-mail address
conflict.message: It seems you already have a user account. You may use this account to access your dashboard.

error.message: Something went wrong and we were not able to create your account. Please try again.

intro.title: Start monitoring your website today

deniedToastNotification.title: Permission Denied
deniedToastNotification.body: You do not have permission to perform this action.
